#include<bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

typedef long long ll;
typedef pair<int, int> pi;

#define MP make_pair
#define PB push_back
#define F first
#define S second
#define MOD 1000000007
#define INF (1 << 30)

ll prefix[100005];
ll mod_hash[100005];

int main()
{
	ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
	int t, i;
	int n, m, x;
	cin >> t;
	while(t--)
	{
		cin >> n >> m >> x;
		int a[n];
		memset(prefix, 0, sizeof prefix);
		memset(mod_hash, 0, sizeof mod_hash);
		for(i = 0; i < n; i++)
		{
			cin >> a[i];
			a[i] %= m;
			mod_hash[a[i]]++;
		}
		prefix[0] = mod_hash[0];
		for(i = 1; i < m; i++)
		{
			prefix[i] = prefix[i - 1] + mod_hash[i];
		}
		ll ans = 0;
		for(i = 0; i < n; i++)
		{
			int l = m - a[i];
			int r = min(m - 1, l + x);
			if(l == 0)
				ans += prefix[r];
			else
				ans += prefix[r] - prefix[l - 1];
			if(x >= a[i])
				ans += prefix[x - a[i]];
		}
		cout << ans << endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
